aboutMe.name: About
aboutMe.text: I consider myself someone who balances a playful and lighthearted approach with a strong sense of responsibility and focus when needed. My core principles revolve around respect, kindness, integrity, and mindfulness, and I make it a point to always be truthful and open. I thrive on personal growth and motivating those around me.

aboutMe.name: Objective
aboutMe.text: I am deeply ambitious and dedicated to achieving holistic success and health in every aspect of my life. Constantly pursuing wisdom and self-improvement comes naturally to me, as I strive to expand my skills and knowledge. Beyond personal achievement, my aspiration is to build generational wealth and leave a meaningful impact on the lives of others, contributing positively to society's well-being.

hobbies.name: Sport
hobbies.text: Throughout my life, a mainstay has been sport. I grew up playing football, sprinting and doing other athletic events. My favourite sports are football, MMA, rugby, athletics and Formula 1. Sport has taught me lessons of perserverence, unity and reward.

hobbies.name: anime
hobbies.text: My creativity has always been a great asset, in problem solving, expression and leisure. I enjoy designing, drawing, painting, poetry and music. Web Development has allowed me to exercise my creativity and it's helping me thrive holistically.

hobbies.name: Family
hobbies.text: Spending quality time with my family, friends, and pets brings me immense joy. I am naturally sociable and cherish moments of relaxation and playful banter with my loved ones. They have played a pivotal role in shaping my character, and I feel incredibly fortunate to share meaningful experiences with them.

education.description: Completed an intensive coding program focusing on full-stack web development. Gained hands-on experience with front-end and back-end technologies.
Studied Web Development at one of the leading institutions in technical and vocational education. Acquired foundational knowledge and practical skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python and PhotoShop.
Completed specialized training in information technology, focusing on [specific areas like networking, software development, cybersecurity, etc.].
Attended a technical high school that emphasized both academic excellence and practical skills. Specialized in [specific technical subjects, e.g., engineering, computer science, etc.].

work.description: I was a Sales Consultant placed inside of a cellular Store. I was resonsible for all stock in and out of the store.
Im am Aspiring Software Developer doing an Internship and understanding the ways of a Developer

testimonials.name: Mohammad Mohammed
testimonials.message: Azhar Jacobs is the epitome of reliability and competence. His work ethic is inspiring, and his ability to navigate challenges with a calm demeanor is remarkable. Beyond his professional skills, Azhar's kindness and readiness to assist others make him someone you can always count on.

testimonials.name: Nasheeta Jacobs
testimonials.message: Azhar Jacobs is not just a coworker but a beacon of positivity in our workplace. His dedication to teamwork and problem-solving has not only made him an invaluable asset but also a cherished friend. His ability to motivate and uplift everyone around him sets him apart.

testimonials.name: Zakariya Salie
testimonials.message: Working alongside Azhar Jacobs has been an absolute pleasure. His professionalism and attention to detail are second to none. What really stands out is his genuine care for his colleagues. He goes out of his way to support us, making him not just a coworker but a true friend.

testimonials.name: Kyle Brink
testimonials.message: As a coworker, Azhar Jacobs is simply exceptional. His expertise in his field is matched only by his humility and willingness to collaborate. What makes him truly special, though, is his unwavering friendship. He's the kind of person who makes every day at work brighter.

testimonials.name: Asheeka Samuels
testimonials.message: I've had the privilege of knowing Azhar Jacobs both as a coworker and a friend. His passion for his work is contagious, and his approachability makes him someone everyone enjoys working with. Azhar's ability to build strong relationships within the team is a testament to his character and leadership.

testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
testimonials.message: As a coding lecturer, I've had the pleasure of witnessing Azhar Jacobs' growth and proficiency firsthand. His dedication to mastering programming concepts and his eagerness to help fellow learners grasp difficult topics are truly commendable. Azhar's enthusiasm for coding is infectious, making him not only a standout student but also a supportive peer in our learning community. His ability to break down complex ideas into understandable pieces sets him apart. Azhar Jacobs is not just a talented coder; he's someone who enhances the learning environment with his collaborative spirit and genuine passion for programming.
